newsItems.title: ðŸŽ¨ Enhanced AI Model: Anime V2 Update
newsItems.description: We're excited to introduce our improved Anime V2 model! Enjoy enhanced image generation with better quality, more consistent results, and improved anime-style outputs.

paragraphs.subTitle: What's New
paragraphs.content: Our latest update brings significant improvements to image generation with our new Anime V2 model, offering better facial details, more consistent character designs, and enhanced background generation.

paragraphs.subTitle: Community Thanks
paragraphs.content: A huge thank you to our amazing community for your continued support and feedback. Your suggestions have helped shape these improvements and make our app better for everyone.

paragraphs.subTitle: Coming Soon
paragraphs.content: We're working on even more exciting features and improvements. Stay tuned for future updates that will bring new creative possibilities to your anime art generation!
